title: Spatiotemporal changes in future precipitation of Afghanistan for shared socioeconomic pathways
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Sayed Tamim Rahimi, Ziauddin Safari, Shamsuddin Shahid, Md Munir Hayet Khan, Zulfiqar Ali, Ghaith Falah Ziarh, Mohamad Rajab Houmsi, Mohd Khairul Idlan bin Muhammad, Il-Moon Chung, Sungwon Kim, Zaher Mundher Yaseen
